name: UINavigationBarDelegate
desc: Methods that a navigation bar calls before and after it modifies its stack of navigation items.

items.name: func navigationBar(UINavigationBar, shouldPush: UINavigationItem) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the navigation bar should push an item.

items.name: func navigationBar(UINavigationBar, didPush: UINavigationItem)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an item was pushed onto the navigation bar.

items.name: func navigationBar(UINavigationBar, shouldPop: UINavigationItem) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the navigation bar should pop an item.

items.name: func navigationBar(UINavigationBar, didPop: UINavigationItem)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an item was popped from the navigation bar.
